reference.title: euare-usergetloginprofile
reference.shortdesc: Returns user name for a user.

row.entry: Name of the user whose login profile you want to get.

section.title: Output
section.p: Eucalyptus returns the user name for the specified user or, if the user has no password, it returns an error message.

section.title: Example
section.p: The following example shows the response for a user with a password.
The following example shows the response for a user who has no password.
section.codeblock: euare-usergetloginprofile -u myuser Error(NoSuchEntity): Can not find login profile for myuser
